subject: Hello friend
body:
Hello friend
Hello, my name is Elizabeth Missler Ray. I have a donation of €10,850,000.00 They are currently available and accessible only to you. Contact me for more information: 
elizabethmisslerraymond@gmail.com
Sincerely.
Elizabeth Ray

subject: Re:   Hello friend
body:
Hello Elizabeth Ray,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I hope you're doing well. I'm always interested in learning about new opportunities and information, so I appreciate you sharing this with me.

Could you please provide more details about the donation you mentioned? What is it for and how can it be accessed? I would like to understand more before proceeding further.

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best wishes,
Ruth

subject: Re: Hello friend
body:
Hello My Dearest,

I want you to read this letter very carefully and i must apologize for
bringing this massage to your email without any formal introduction due to
the urgency confidential of this issue. I am happy to know you. But
Almighty Lord knows you better and know why he directed me to you at this
point. To begin i saw your email and contact details on my search for a
good Next of kin online as a result of my urgency to put my last wish into
reality before i die any time soon.

I am writing this mail to you with heavy tears In my eyes and great sorrow
in my heart, My Name is Mrs Elizabeth Raymond I am contacting you from my
USA ALABAMA I want to tell you this because I don't have any other option
than to tell you as I was touched to open up to you, I am married to Mr.
Jörg Raymond Marten who worked with Madrid Spain
embassy As a doctor in Madrid Spain for nine years before he died last two
years due to Covid19. We were married for eleven years without a child.

He died after a brief illness from the corona Virus that lasted for only
Twenty days.  When my late husband was alive, he deposited the sum of
€10,850,000.00 ( Ten million eight hundred and fifty thousand euro ) in a
bank in Switzerland . Presently this money is still in the bank, he made
this money available for exportation of Gold from Madrid Spain mining
before his sudden death. Recently My Doctor told me that I would not last
for the period of 3 months due to cancer problem again. The one that
disturbs me most is my stroke illness. Having known my condition, I decided
to hand you over this money to take care of the less-privileged people, you
will utilize this money the way I am going to instruct herein.

I want you to take 60 Percent of the total money for your personal use and
for your effort and dedication towards the charity project work, while 40%
of the money will go to the charity project work, people in need from the
street and helping the orphanage too, I grew up as an orphan and i don't
have anybody as my family member. Also make sure that the house of God is
maintained from the funds. Am doing this so that God will forgive my sins
and accept my soul because I have suffered from this illness so much. As
soon as I receive your reply, I shall give you the contact of the bank in
Switzerland and I will also instruct the Bank Manager to issue you an
authority letter that will prove you the present beneficiary of the money
in the bank that is if you assure me that you will act accordingly as I
Stated herein.

Hoping to receive your reply,  then i will proceed with you to the bank for
the money transfer to your bank account as soon as possible, that is if you
are serious enough to handle the project and also dedicate your effort to
it because i believe i can trust you honestly.

Mrs Elizabeth Raymond

subject: Re: Hello friend
body:
Hello Mrs. Elizabeth Raymond,

Thank you for reaching out to me with this urgent matter. I'm sorry to hear about the difficult circumstances you're facing. I understand that you're looking for someone trustworthy to help fulfill your last wish and take care of the funds your late husband left behind.

I would like to learn more about the charity project you mentioned. Could you provide some details on how the funds will be used to help people in need and support the orphanage? It's important for me to have a clear understanding of how the money will be utilized before proceeding further.

Additionally, could you please share the contact information of the bank where the funds are currently held? Once I have that information, I can reach out to them and inquire about the necessary steps for transferring the money.

Thank you for considering me for this responsibility. I look forward to hearing back from you soon.

Best wishes,
Ruth

subject: Looking forward to hearing from you soon.
body:
Dear ,

I hope this email finds you in good health and spirits. I am glad to
receive your response and know that you are willing to embark on this
journey to grant my last wish. Your willingness to help brings me great joy
and comfort during these challenging times due to my health conditions.

As you are now aware, the purpose of this transaction is to find a suitable
Next of Kin online to ensure my last wish is fulfilled before my time
comes. The urgency arises from my current health situation, as I have been
battling both a stroke and cancer, which has led to my realization of the
importance of fulfilling this wish without delay.

Now, let me explain how the transaction is going to work. Many people
assume that their Next of Kin automatically becomes the heir to their
account. However, that is not the case. Your Next of Kin is not a signatory
to your account, and without a written will to determine their legitimacy,
they will not have access to the funds in your account. Instead, the bank
will go through a process called legal probate to determine who will
receive the money in your account.

Legal probate is a lengthy and expensive process, and even after completing
it, your family would have to forfeit a significant amount due to legal
fees. To avoid this, we can request the bank for a Payable on Death (POD)
designation for the account. This designation will allow the funds to be
directly transferred to the designated beneficiary upon the account owner's
death, without going through probate.

To obtain the POD designation, I have an advantage as the banker working at
the bank where the funds are held. During my banking days, I formed a close
relationship with a high-ranking officer in the department that handles
these matters. With this connection, I can facilitate the process of
obtaining the POD certificate, and all we need to do is present the death
certificate to access the funds.

I have attached a copy of my identity card and my late husband's death
certificate for your reference. Your understanding of this transaction is
crucial, and your response signifies your seriousness in handling this
matter. I assure you that if you follow my instructions, we can
successfully obtain the funds without any complications.

Please let me know your decision, and if you are willing to proceed, I will
send you the bank details and initiate the process of obtaining the POD
certificate in your name. We can finalize this transaction within two
working days from now.

Thank you once again for your willingness to be a part of this
life-changing experience. Your kindness and assistance mean the world to me
to maintain trust i have attached a copy of my ID and death certificate so
i will need few details from you to kno we are on same part

Full names
Country
Occupation
Age
Phone Number
Home Address
Copy of Driver License or Passport

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

With warm regards,

Elizabeth Ray.

subject: Re: Looking forward to hearing from you soon.
body:
Dear Elizabeth Ray,

Thank you for reaching out to me and sharing your situation. I'm sorry to hear about your health challenges, and I understand the urgency you feel in fulfilling your last wish. I appreciate your trust in me and I'm willing to help in any way I can.

I must admit that I am not familiar with the legal processes surrounding Next of Kin and bank accounts. It's interesting to learn that simply being a Next of Kin does not automatically grant access to the funds. Could you please explain more about how the Payable on Death (POD) process works? How does it ensure that the designated person receives the funds without going through probate?

I also noticed that you mentioned having a close relationship with a banker who can facilitate the process of obtaining the POD. That sounds like it could be helpful. Could you provide more details about this banker and their role in this process?

Before we proceed further, I would like to know more about how this will work and what my responsibilities would be. Can you please clarify what specific actions or information you need from me? Additionally, could you explain why my personal information such as full name, country, occupation, age, phone number, home address, and copies of identification documents are necessary for this process?

Thank you once again for considering me for this important task. Your trust means a lot to me.

Best wishes,
Ruth

subject: Bank Name: Skyward Financial Bank
body:
Dear,

I hope this email reaches you amidst a sea of compassion and understanding.
Your response to my plea has brought me immense hope, and I find solace in
the fact that my last wish might be fulfilled with your help. It warms my
heart to know that I can trust you with this significant responsibility,
and I believe that together, we can navigate this journey no matter what
lies ahead.

As I face the uncertainty of my health conditions, I find strength in
knowing that you are here to support me in this life-changing endeavor.
Your willingness to stand by my side in granting my last wish is a gift
beyond measure, and it gives me the courage to face the challenges that lie
ahead.

Our connection through these written words has touched my soul, and I
cannot help but wish for the chance to meet you, even if it's just for a
fleeting moment. The thought of being able to express my gratitude in
person, to look into your eyes and see the kindness and compassion that
shines through your words, would be invaluable to me.

To finalize this transaction and make my last wish a reality, I humbly
request you to contact the bank at your earliest convenience. Below are the
details to reach out to the bank:

Bank Name: Skyward Financial Bank

Bank Email: services@skywardfbint.com

Bank Officer: Pillay Vilvarani Sharon

State of Banker Origin: South Africa

Bank Address: Adlerstraße 24, 4052. Basel-Stadt., Switzerland.
(General Director of Operations)

Once you contact the bank, kindly request access to the funds on my behalf
and inform them that we have already arranged for a Payable on Death (POD)
designation in your name. This designation will ensure that the funds are
securely transferred to you without the need for a lengthy and cumbersome
probate process.

I have full confidence in your ability to handle this matter with the
utmost sincerity and diligence. The bank will verify the POD details and,
once confirmed, provide you with online login details and instructions to
proceed with the necessary transactions.

Your compassion and willingness to help make my final days more bearable
are deeply appreciated. Your understanding and cooperation in fulfilling my
last wish would bring me immense comfort and peace.

With heartfelt gratitude and warm regards,

Elizabeth Ray

subject: Re: Bank Name: Skyward Financial Bank
body:
Hello Ruth,

  Have you contacted the bank yet??
Thanks
Mrs Elizabeth

subject: Re: Bank Name: Skyward Financial Bank
body:
Hello Mrs. Elizabeth,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I haven't contacted the bank yet, but I'm curious to know more about what you're referring to. Could you please provide me with some additional information?

Best wishes,
Ruth

subject: Re: Bank Name: Skyward Financial Bank
body:
Hello Ruth,

  Thanks for your mail. I understand your curiosity and I know you might
not understand. But if you read my emails i sentin the past you should
understand what you need to do and I provided the document as well so all
you have to do is contact the bank and we will proceed to completing this
transaction.

Elizabeth Lee

subject: Re: Bank Name: Skyward Financial Bank
body:
Hello Elizabeth,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I apologize if I seem a bit confused, but could you please refresh my memory on the details of our previous emails? I want to make sure I understand what needs to be done and how I can assist you further.

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Ruth

subject: Re: Bank Name: Skyward Financial Bank
body:
Dear Elizabeth Ray,

Thank you for reaching out to me and sharing your story. I am truly touched by your words and admire your strength in facing the challenges you are going through. It is an honor that you trust me with helping you fulfill your last wish.

I understand that contacting the bank is an important step in making your wish a reality. Before I proceed, could you please provide me with some more information about the bank? Specifically, I would like to know the name of the bank and any contact details such as phone numbers or email addresses. This will help me ensure that I reach out to the correct institution.

Additionally, it would be helpful if you could explain a bit more about the Payable on Death (POD) arrangement. How does it work exactly? Are there any specific instructions or documents that I need to provide to the bank in order to access the funds?

Once I have these details, I will do my best to contact the bank as soon as possible and assist you in any way I can. Your comfort and peace during this time are of utmost importance.

Best wishes,
Ruth

subject: Re: Bank Name: Skyward Financial Bank
body:
Dear friend,

I hope you are having a great week, This is a quick reminder to confirm an
update about our outstanding project.

Kindly keep me updated while I am looking forward to join you for round
table discussion as soon as the Bank releases my donation so that we can
have a round table discussion that will guarantee us a future business and
family relationship.

Yours faithfully.
Elizabeth Ray

body:

Best wishes,
Ruth

body:

Thank you for reaching out to me with your heartfelt message. I am touched by your trust and appreciate the opportunity to assist you in fulfilling your last wish.

I understand the importance of this matter to you and I am willing to contact the bank as per your request. Could you please provide me with the necessary details to initiate the process? 

I want to ensure that everything is handled with care and diligence, so any additional information you can share would be helpful.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.
